channel.title: Adding donator symbol?
channel.description:
How do i add donor sign when you talk?
msn me or reply
zack16austin@live.com thanks

item.title: Adding donator symbol?
item.dc:creator: @why_so_serious why so serious
item.description:
@why_so_serious wrote:

[quote=“Pzezima2, post:2, topic:378053”]im not sure how to do it when you talk.
but to make it appear when your yelling.
look for your commands and look for yell.
then it should say:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Administrator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Dev Team] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 4) {
                titles = "[Co-Owner] ";
            }
            if (donator == 1) {
                titles = "[Donator] ";
            }
	if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
            }
	if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Death")) {
                titles = "[The Mighty Boss and Owner]";
            }
            talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));
    }[/code]

Now to make it do the symbol
add this:

if (donator == 1) { titles = "[Donator]<img=3> "; }

it depends on what server your using because all the images could be different
maybe you could search for the admin crown pictures <img=1> and stuff in your server files
and you might be able to add the donator picture.
hopefully this helps you[/quote]

thanks alot(:

Read full topic

item.title: Adding donator symbol?
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

im not sure how to do it when you talk.
but to make it appear when your yelling.
look for your commands and look for yell.
then it should say:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Administrator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Dev Team] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 4) {
                titles = "[Co-Owner] ";
            }
            if (donator == 1) {
                titles = "[Donator] ";
            }
	if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
            }
	if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Death")) {
                titles = "[The Mighty Boss and Owner]";
            }
            talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));
    }[/code]

Now to make it do the symbol
add this:

if (donator == 1) { titles = "[Donator]<img=3> "; }

it depends on what server your using because all the images could be different
maybe you could search for the admin crown pictures <img=1> and stuff in your server files
and you might be able to add the donator picture.
hopefully this helps you

Read full topic
